firefox.notes: Starting with version 17, the quotation mark (") is replaced by its HTML reference character (") in strings supplied for the name parameter.

deno.notes: Only the locale data for en-US is available.

nodejs.notes: Before version 13.0.0, only the locale data for en-US is available by default. When other locales are specified, the function silently falls back to en-US. To make full ICU (locale) data available before version 13, see Node.js documentation on the --with-intl option and how to provide the data.

ie.notes: A replacement function as second argument is not supported.

deno.notes: Only the locale data for en-US is available.

To make full ICU (locale) data available before version 13, see Node.js documentation on the --with-intl option and how to provide the data.

firefox.notes: Starting in Firefox 74, toSource() is no longer available for use by web content. It is still allowed for internal and privileged code.
A placeholder property named @@iterator is used.
A placeholder property named iterator is used.
